warning.text:
If you are using 1.19, 1.19.1, 1.19.2, or 1.19.3 you can safely ignore the "made for a newer version of Minecraft" warning when applying your resource pack in-game, as it is incorrect.
(If you are using 1.19.4, you won't see this warning.)

packs.name: sodium
packs.description: A modern rendering engine for Minecraft which greatly improves performance

packs.name: iris
packs.description: A modern shaders mod for Minecraft intended to be compatible with existing OptiFine shader packs

packs.name: WavyLeaves
packs.description:
Makes Leaves wave in the wind.
This pack is NOT designed for Fast Graphics.
May run into rendering issues when using with the Sodium or OptiFine mods.
